resources.string: A hockey game consists of three 20-minute periods.
Players can use their hands to carry the puck down the ice.
Offside is when an attacking player enters the offensive zone before the puck.
Icing is when a player shoots the puck from their defensive zone all the way down the ice and across the opponent\'s goal line without it being touched by another player.
Six players, including the goalie, are allowed on the ice for each team at any given time.
" out of 5 on the Hockey Quiz"
